Kiyoshi Isozaki
President & CEO
JSAT Corporation
I would like to extend my warmest congratulations on the occasion of AI3 10th Anniversary. We at JSAT Corporation sincerely respect this historic achievement.

JSAT has participated in AI3 Project since its incubation in 1995, as the joint research project for the satellite internet technology. Over the last 10 years, the project has improved to operate as one of the most significant satellite-based research networks in the Asian region. We think this dramatic achievement was a fruit of the leadership of the WIDE project and strenuous effort executed by AI3 partners.

Also, I would like to congratulate on the SOI-Asia 5th Anniversary. We understand that the SOI-Asia is the most successful distant learning project in Asia, and now becoming the vital infrastructure in the educational field. It was our great pleasure to cooperate with SOI-Asia Project as a satellite operator and to contribute toward further expanding the network.
It is our sincere hope that you will be able to maintain and grow this research activity, and we look to cooperating with you continuously.
